t: Amazon.com: DeMite Laundry Additive - Dust Mite Waste Remover for ...
s: Breathe Easy Once Again – Kick your allergy symptoms once and for all. Sneezing, a runny nose, and watery eyes are often caused by dust mite waste in your laundry. DeMite is the laundry additive solution for ridding your fabrics of dust mite waste and reducing allergy triggers in your home.

t: Amazon.com: DeMite Laundry Additive for Allergic Reactions w/Pillow Protectors 2-Pack 21”x27” Pillow Cover - Protects Bedding & Clothing (Standard Cases + 1L) - Safe Around Children and Pets : Home & Kitchen
s: DeMite Laundry Additive - Concentrated laundry additive removes waste that causes allergic reactions from bedding and clothing. Simply add to the wash with your favorite laundry detergent and wash at any temperature. Safe for all washable, colorfast items.

t: Amazon.com: DeMite Laundry Additive, 8 Ounce by DeMite
s: Sort laundry by maker's care instructions. Select the water temperature. Add regular detergent. Fill the DeMite measuring cup 3/4 full for non-HE top loading washers or 1/4 full for front or HE top loading washers. Add DeMite to the washer either when filled or while filling with water.
